MovieSeen.overview: Imprisoned in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison, where he puts his accounting skills to work for an amoral warden. During his long stretch in prison, Dufresne comes to be admired by the other inmates -- including an older prisoner named Red -- for his integrity and unquenchable sense of hope.
MovieSeen.title: The Shawshank Redemption

MovieSeen.overview: Blindsided by a new generation of blazing-fast racers, the legendary Lightning McQueen is suddenly pushed out of the sport he loves. To get back in the game, he will need the help of an eager young race technician with her own plan to win, inspiration from the late Fabulous Hudson Hornet, and a few unexpected turns. Proving that #95 isn't through yet will test the heart of a champion on Piston Cup Racing’s biggest stage!
MovieSeen.title: Cars 3

MovieSeen.overview: Ripley, the sole survivor of the Nostromo's deadly encounter with the monstrous Alien, returns to Earth after drifting through space in hypersleep for 57 years. Although her story is initially met with skepticism, she agrees to accompany a team of Colonial Marines back to LV-426.
MovieSeen.title: Aliens

MovieSeen.overview: Princess Leia is captured and held hostage by the evil Imperial forces in their effort to take over the galactic Empire. Venturesome Luke Skywalker and dashing captain Han Solo team together with the loveable robot duo R2-D2 and C-3PO to rescue the beautiful princess and restore peace and justice in the Empire.
MovieSeen.title: Star Wars

MovieSeen.overview: Luke Skywalker leads a mission to rescue his friend Han Solo from the clutches of Jabba the Hutt, while the Emperor seeks to destroy the Rebellion once and for all with a second dreaded Death Star.
MovieSeen.title: Return of the Jedi

MovieSeen.overview: From the earliest versions of the script to the blockbuster debuts, explore the creation of the Star Wars Trilogy.
MovieSeen.original_title: Empire of Dreams: The Story of the Star Wars Trilogy
MovieSeen.title: Empire of Dreams: The Story of the Star Wars Trilogy

MovieSeen.overview: A rogue band of resistance fighters unite for a mission to steal the Death Star plans and bring a new hope to the galaxy.
MovieSeen.original_title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
MovieSeen.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story

MovieSeen.overview: The evil Darth Sidious enacts his final plan for unlimited power -- and the heroic Jedi Anakin Skywalker must choose a side.
MovieSeen.original_title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
MovieSeen.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith

MovieSeen.overview: Robot Chicken: Star Wars Episode III, directed by Chris McKay, combines the satirical sensibilities of Green and Matthew Senreich's Robot Chicken with characters of the Star Wars universe.
MovieSeen.original_title: Robot Chicken: Star Wars Episode III
MovieSeen.title: Robot Chicken: Star Wars Episode III

MovieSeen.overview: Thirty years after defeating the Galactic Empire, Han Solo and his allies face a new threat from the evil Kylo Ren and his army of Stormtroopers.
MovieSeen.title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens

MovieSeen.overview: A series of 30 sketches, following the hilarious antics of various characters from a galaxy, far, far away.
MovieSeen.title: Robot Chicken: Star Wars

MovieSeen.overview: Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker, who is unsettled by the strength of her powers. Meanwhile, the Resistance prepares to do battle with the First Order.
MovieSeen.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi

MovieSeen.overview: Following an assassination attempt on Senator Padm√© Amidala, Jedi Knights Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi investigate a mysterious plot that could change the galaxy forever.
MovieSeen.original_title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
MovieSeen.title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones

MovieSeen.overview: Anakin Skywalker, a young slave strong with the Force, is discovered on Tatooine. Meanwhile, the evil Sith have returned, enacting their plot for revenge against the Jedi.
MovieSeen.original_title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
MovieSeen.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace

MovieSeen.overview: After stalking and saving the life of her favorite fiction author in a car accident, his  manic obsessor holds him captive in her remote Colorado home then forces him to write back to life the popular literary character he killed off.
MovieSeen.title: Misery

MovieToWatch.overview: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.
MovieToWatch.title: Cars 2
